name: Bugs of Life
description:
It's my game for "Global Game Jam Next 2020" event, My first game jam, My first published game. Also characters made by finger and phone. ...

#From_Iran #از_ایران

Online version (No need to download): scratch.mit.edu/projects/414022634

Offline version (Downloadable): You need open it with Scratch (that can download it from scratch.mit.edu/download and see supported operating systems)

[It was made with Scratch 3.12.0 on Windows]
